OUR STAKEHOLDERS 
AEGON uses a ‘ stakeholder	framework ’ to help define its approach to sustainability and identify issues of material 
importance to the company (see below). This framework helps shape both internal initiatives and AEGON’s overall 
policies with regard to sustainability issues, as well as providing support to the company’s broader business strategy.

AEGON’s Sustainability Report follows a similar structure, and aims to provide both information and a focus for 
continued dialogue with the company’s stakeholders. Consequently, this report is structured around AEGON’s main 
stakeholder groups: its customers, employees, business partners, investors as well as the wider community in which 
the company operates. AEGON believes that this stakeholder framework provides a balanced approach to gauging 
the company’s overall performance, taking into account financial, social, environmental and governance factors. STRATEGIC	 PRIORITIES
